meanings.definition: The action of forming pleats in fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carefully created pleatings in the skirt to give it a stylish look.
meanings.sent2: The dress had beautiful pleatings along the waistline.
meanings.sent3: The tailor joked that his pleatings were so perfect, they could dance on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her pleatings were like a row of soldiers standing in perfect formation.
meanings.sent5: The pleatings on the curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: A series of pleats in fabric.
meanings.sent1: The pleatings on the dress were neatly aligned and added texture.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate pleatings on the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The pleatings on the shirt seemed to have a mind of their own, moving with the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The pleatings cascaded down the gown like a waterfall of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The pleatings on the pillowcase gave it a cozy and inviting look.
